oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph at Blue-Gray reunion
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Board-mounted photograph of Federal and Confederate veterans at an outdoor reunion barbecue. People are sitting at tables and milling about under the trees. An estimated 15,000-20,000 visitors attended, most wearing their "Sunday best." A. W. Judd,; Portrait and Landscape Photographer, made the image.
